author: JORGE CISNEROS
title: Morena en el Senado \u0026quot;autoriza\u0026quot; a Sheinbaum a no eliminar publicación del Diario Oficial
text: Las fracciones de Morena y aliados en las cámaras de Senadores y Diputados recomendaron a la presidenta Claudia Sheinbaum a no eliminar la publicación de la reforma al Poder Judicial del Diario Oficial de la Federación (DOF), como le requirió la jueza Nancy Juárez. [ÚNETE A NUESTRO CANAL DE WHATSAPP. EL PODER DE LA INFORMACIÓN EN LA PALMA DE TU MANO](https://www.whatsapp.com/channel/0029Va6evSkGk1Ftej78ks0B) En su conferencia de este jueves, la presidenta dijo que enviaría una comunicación al Congreso para que dieran su opinión respecto a la exigencia de la jueza[.](https://lasillarota.com/veracruz/estado/2024/10/20/se-extralimita-claudia-sheinbaum-vuelve-criticar-jueza-de-veracruz-por-pedir-borrar-reforma-judicial-506539.html) Te podría interesar Pocas horas después de la declaración, el presidente de la Mesa Directiva de la Cámara de Diputados, Sergio Gutiérrez, respondió que la mandataria no tiene por qué retirar la publicación. En el Senado, el presidente de la mesa, el morenista Gerardo Fernández Noroña, sometió a votación si se autorizaba la eliminación de la reforma del DOF pese a las objeciones de la oposición, que argumentó que no había sustento legal para llevar a cabo la consulta. Noroña dijo al principio de la sesión vespertina que había recibido la comunicación enviada por la consejería jurídica de la presidencia para que se le diera trámite. Tras una discusión de aproximadamente 40 minutos, la mayoría de Morena y sus aliados del Partido Verde y el PT aprobaron que se recomendara a Sheinbaum no eliminar la publicación por mayoría de 81 votos a favor por 36 en contra. "No hay fundamento legal": oposición "Esta consulta que nos hace la consejera jurídica no está debidamente fundada, no tiene facultades para solicitarle al Senado un acuerdo para eximirla de su responsabilidad. Es una manera de querer torcer la ley para no cumplir con el mandato de una jueza", dijo la priista Carolina Viggiano. El oficio que envió la consejera carece de fundamento legal y sólo se emitió para justificar el incumplimiento de la orden de la titular del juzgado 19 de distrito de Veracruz, dijo la excandidata al gobierno de Hidalgo y secretaria general de su partido[.](https://lasillarota.com/nacion/2024/10/21/fallos-se-acatan-se-impugnan-reviran-jueces-sheinbaum-506621.html) Su compañera Claudia Anaya apuntó en el mismo sentido: "Aquí cualquiera de nosotros, hasta para presentar una iniciativa, fundamentamos qué ley o reglamento nos faculta para ello. En este caso, no hay facultades, ni de consulta ni de respuesta. No hay nada qué responder, es como si nos vienen a pedir permiso para delinquir y ahí vamos a responder". El coordinador de MC, Clemente Castañeda, sostuvo que al Senado no le corresponde tratar ese tema. "Hay una resolución de una jueza. La presidenta, (está) a punto de cometer un desacato, Si la presidencia de la República no está de acuerdo con esa resolución, que la combata por las vías legales", dijo el senador por Jalisco.

author: /author/lokmat-english-desk/
title: Tamil Nadu Rains: Waterlogging Reported in Several Areas; IMD Predicts Heavy Rainfall in Chennai and Other...
text:
Tamil Nadu Rains: Waterlogging Reported in Several Areas; IMD Predicts Heavy Rainfall in Chennai and Other Districts
By [Lokmat English Desk](/author/lokmat-english-desk/) | Published: December 13, 2024 08:12 AM2024-12-13T08:12:20+5:302024-12-13T08:13:19+5:30
Due to overnight rainfall in several districts of Tamil Nadu, waterlogging and traffic jams were reported in the early ...
Due to overnight rainfall in several districts of Tamil Nadu, waterlogging and traffic jams were reported in the early hours of Friday, December 13. Visuals shared by the news agency ANI from Tirunelveli, Madurai, and Thoothukudi show waterlogging on streets due to continued downpours in these districts.
The India Meteorological Department (IMD) has issued a heavy rain alert, with thunderstorms and lightning at isolated spots across Tamil Nadu, Puducherry, and Karaikal. Extremely heavy downpours are likely in the Tenkasi, Tirunelveli, and Thoothukudi districts.
— ANI (@ANI)
[#WATCH]| Tamil Nadu: Rain lashed parts of Thoothukudi.[pic.twitter.com/s0ESdKIFuy][December 13, 2024]
Heavy Rain in Madurai
— ANI (@ANI)
[#WATCH]| Tamil Nadu: Rain lashes parts of Madurai[pic.twitter.com/991yB9nLsV][December 12, 2024]
IMD said that several other districts, including Tiruvallur, Chennai, Kancheepuram, Chengalpattu, Villupuram, Cuddalore, Mayiladuthurai, Nagapattinam, Tiruvarur, Thanjavur, and Puducherry, are likely to witness heavy rain at isolated places. The weather department has issued a warning to fishermen, advising them to avoid venturing into certain coastal areas, including Sri Lanka’s coast, the Gulf of Mannar, the Bay of Bengal, and the Kerala coast, between December 12 and 16, due to adverse weather conditions.
IMD predicted light to moderate rainfall on Saturday, December 14, in parts of Tamil Nadu, Puducherry, and Karaikal. Heavy rain is likely in districts like Nilgiris, Coimbatore, Tiruppur, Theni, Madurai, Virudhunagar, Tenkasi, Tirunelveli, and Thoothukudi.
— IMD-Tamilnadu Weather (@ChennaiRmc)[December 12, 2024]
Also Read | [Puducherry Rains: All Schools and Colleges in Karaikal to Remain Closed Today Due to Heavy Rainfall.](https://www.lokmattimes.com/national/puducherry-rains-all-schools-and-colleges-in-karaikal-to-remain-closed-today-due-to-heavy-rainfall-a517/)
The reason for heavy rainfall in the south belt of Tamil Nadu is due to the low-pressure area over the southwest Bay of Bengal near the Gulf of Mannar. While this system is expected to weaken, the northeast monsoon remains vigorous across Tamil Nadu and Puducherry.
As a precautionary measure, schools in 11 districts, including Chennai, Villupuram, Thanjavur, Mayiladuthurai, Pudukkottai, Cuddalore, Dindigul, Ramanathapuram, Thiruvarur, Ranipet, and Tiruvallur, have been closed.

author: times news cr
title: Thermonuclear installation in the UK sets a record - 2024-02-16 00:21:03 - TIme News
text: 2024-02-16 00:21:03 The Joint European Torus (JET) fusion facility at the Culham Fusion Energy Center (UK) has set a world record for energy production. This was reported in a press release published on the website Phys.org, Day.Az reports with reference to Lenta.ru. JET is a tokamak that uses powerful magnetic fields to confine plasma. Most approaches to creating commercial nuclear fusion involve the use of two isotopes of hydrogen – deuterium and tritium. When deuterium and tritium fuse at 150 million degrees Celsius, helium is formed and a huge amount of energy is produced. It is assumed that this reaction will form the basis of future fusion power plants. During the deuterium-tritium experiments, which were carried out from August 31 to October 14, 2023, the installation produced 69 megajoules within five seconds, using only 0.2 milligrams of fuel. However, the main goal of the tests was to demonstrate minimization of the effect of heated plasma on the internal walls of the installation. According to the scientists, the experiment showed how to cool the exhaust gases, as well as how to stabilize the edge of the plasma to prevent energy emissions from contacting the wall. Both methods, the effectiveness of which was first demonstrated in the deuterium-tritium environment, are intended to protect fusion plants from failure. Subscribe to our WhatsApp channel and stay up to date with the main news!
